Title: The Joy of Christmas with Angela Lansbury
FullTitle: The Joy of Christmas with Angela Lansbury
SortTitle: Joy of Christmas with Angela Lansbury, The
Plot: The Joy of Christmas combines the talent of the world-famous Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square with one of the most enduring and beloved stars of film, theater, and television: Angela Lansbury.
Tagline: Christmas with the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square
